title: Process a Size Exchange
description: A customer ordered a shirt that doesn't fit and wants to exchange it for a different size.

tasks.description: Locate the original order and verify the item the customer wants to exchange.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the original order for the 'Blue T-Shirt, Size M'.

tasks.description: Check inventory for the requested new size ('Blue T-Shirt, Size L').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the new size is in stock.

tasks.description: Create a return authorization for the original item and a new, no-charge order for the replacement item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the exchange in the system.
